title: Gini index of Taiwan 2008 to 2018
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Gini's concentration coefficient, with a total of 11 data points. The chart has 7 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely positive which exists from 2018 to 2016.
Likewise, the next significant trend is slightly negative which exists from 2013 to 2011.
Contrarily, the next significant trend is moderately negative which exists from 2010 to 2008.
But, the next significant trend is slightly negative which exists from 2016 to 2015.
Conversely, the next significant trend is extremely positive which exists from 2015 to 2014.
Similarly, the next significant trend is moderately neutral which exists from 2014 to 2013.
Similarly, the next significant trend is moderately neutral which exists from 2011 to 2010.
gold: This statistic shows the Gini 's concentration coefficient in Taiwan from 2008 to 2018 . In 2018 , the Gini index in Taiwan was 33.8 points , around 0.7 percentage points lower than in 2009 . In the countries having relative equality in their distributions of income , the value of the Gini coefficient usually ranges between the scores of 20 and 35 .
